verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Sing and rejoice, O daughter of Zion:
For, lo, I come,
And I will dwell in the midst of thee,
Saith the Lord.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Deliver thyself, O Zion,
That dwellest with the daughter of Babylon,
For he that toucheth you
Toucheth the apple of his eye.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And many nations shall be joined to the Lord
In that day, and shall be my people:
And I will dwell in the midst of thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And the Lord shall inherit Judah
His portion in the holy land,
And shall choose Jerusalem, Jerusalem again.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Be silent, O all flesh, before the Lord:
For he is raised up
Out of his holy habitation
